languages.text: "Обвинения, выдвинутые губернатором Драйвстемом, были сфальсифицированы. Род Версериан не причастен к организации бунтов и заговору против Вольного Торговца. И все же это дело далеко от своего завершения..."

traits.locale_text: "Обвинения, выдвинутые губернатором Драйвстемом, были сфальсифицированы. Род Версериан не причастен к организации бунтов и заговору против Вольного Торговца. Я признаю виновным..."

languages.text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. And yet this matter is far from concluded..."
languages.original_text: "Обвинения, выдвинутые губернатором Драйвстемом, были сфальсифицированы. Род Версериан не причастен к организации бунтов и заговору против Вольного Торговца. И все же это дело далеко от своего завершения..."

traits.locale_text: "The charges pressed by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian is not involved in organising the riots and conspiring against the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, this case is still far from being closed..."

"The charges pressed by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian is not involved in organising the riots and conspiring against the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, this case is still far from being closed..."

"The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. And yet this matter is far from concluded..."

languages.text: 「ドライブステム総督による告発はねつ造だった。ウェルザリアン家は、組織的な暴動とも、自由開拓者を標的にした陰謀とも無関係である。とは言え、事件が解決したとは到底言えない…」
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. And yet this matter is far from concluded..."

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブステム総督による告発はねつ造だった。ウェルザリアン家は、組織的な暴動とも、自由開拓者を標的にした陰謀とも無関係である。とは言え、事件が解決したとは到底言えない…」

languages.text: “德莱夫斯塔总督的指控纯属捏造，韦尔森家族从未煽动任何暴乱或参与针对行商浪人的阴谋。不过，这件事情还远远没有结束……”
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. And yet this matter is far from concluded..."

traits.locale_text: “德莱夫斯塔总督的指控纯属捏造，韦尔森家族从未煽动任何暴乱或参与针对行商浪人的阴谋。不过，这件事情还远远没有结束……”

languages.text: « Les accusations portées par le gouverneur Drivestem étaient inventées de toutes pièces. La maison Werserian n'est en aucun cas mêlée aux révoltes et au complot visant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Pour autant, l'affaire est encore loin d'être close... »
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. And yet this matter is far from concluded..."

traits.locale_text: « Les accusations portées par le gouverneur Drivestem étaient inventées de toutes pièces. La maison Werserian n'est en aucun cas mêlée aux révoltes et au complot visant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Pour autant, l'affaire est encore loin d'être close... »

languages.text: «Los cargos de presentados por el gobernador Drivestem son falsos. La casa Werserian no tiene nada que ver con los disturbios ni con el complot contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Sin embargo, el caso dista mucho de cerrarse...».
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. And yet this matter is far from concluded..."

traits.locale_text: «Los cargos de presentados por el gobernador Drivestem son falsos. La casa Werserian no tiene nada que ver con los disturbios ni con el complot contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Sin embargo, el caso dista mucho de cerrarse...».

languages.text: "Die von Gouverneur Drivestem vorgebrachten Anschuldigungen waren fingiert. Haus Werserian hatte nichts mit den Aufständen und der Intrige gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu tun. Und doch ist diese Angelegenheit alles andere als abgeschlossen ..."
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. And yet this matter is far from concluded..."

traits.locale_text: "Die von Gouverneur Drivestem vorgebrachten Anschuldigungen waren fingiert. Haus Werserian hat nichts mit der Anzettelung der Aufstände und mit der Intrige gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu tun. Doch dieser Fall ist noch lange nicht geklärt ..."

languages.text: "Vali Drivestem'in ortaya attığı ithamlar sahte çıkmıştır. Werserian Hanesi mensuplarının Hür Tacir'e karşı entrika düzenlediğine yahut isyan çıkardığına dair bir kanıt bulunamamıştır. Fakat bu mesele henüz kapanmamıştır..."
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by Governor Drivestem were fabricated. House Werserian had nothing to do with the orchestration of the riots or the plot targeting the Rogue Trader. And yet this matter is far from concluded..."

traits.locale_text: "Vali Drivestem'in ortaya attığı ithamlar sahte çıkmıştır. Werserian Hanesi mensuplarının Hür Tacir'e karşı entrika düzenlediğine yahut isyan çıkardığına dair bir kanıt bulunamamıştır. Fakat bu mesele henüz kapanmamıştır..."
